en: What's Scotland like in summer?
zh: 苏格兰的夏天怎么样？

en: I would like to join the summer camp.
zh: 我想参加夏令营。

en: St Mark's Square in Venice is always swarming with tourists in the summer.
zh: 威尼斯的圣马可广场在夏天总是挤满了游客。

en: I like everything that comes with summer.
zh: 我喜欢夏天的一切。

en: I have to write a paper of more than 10 pages for my summer homework.
zh: 我必须为我的暑假作业写一篇超过10页的论文。

en: We can see a lot of stars at night in summer.
zh: 夏天晚上我们可以看到很多星星。

en: Please conserve water in summer.
zh: 请在夏天节约用水。

en: Grass is luxuriant in summer.
zh: 夏天草木茂盛。

en: The town was deluged with tourists in summer.
zh: 夏天，这个小镇挤满了游客。

en: In summer, European people enjoy long holidays.
zh: 在夏天，欧洲人享受长假。

en: We have much rain in summer but on the other hand we have little rain in winter.
zh: 我们夏天雨水很多，但另一方面，我们冬天雨水很少。

en: In summer, we used to go swimming in the river.
zh: 夏天，我们过去常常去河里游泳。

en: Tourists take over this island in the summer.
zh: 夏天，游客占领了这个岛屿。

en: In summer, we enjoy outdoor sports.
zh: 夏天，我们喜欢户外运动。

en: In summer, they used to play on the beach all day long.
zh: 夏天，他们过去常常整天在海滩上玩耍。

en: In the long summer days she sat in the sun and watched the trees cover themselves with leaves, and the white daisies cover the hill.
zh: 在漫长的夏日里，她坐在阳光下，看着树木长满叶子，白色的雏菊覆盖了山丘。

en: In the summer, people go to the seaside.
zh: 夏天，人们去海边。

en: I often go swimming at the beach in the summer.
zh: 夏天我经常去海滩游泳。

en: It gets hot and humid in summer.
zh: 夏天变得又热又潮湿。

en: Did you go anywhere for the summer?
zh: 你夏天去哪里了吗？

en: Which do you like better, summer or winter?
zh: 你更喜欢夏天还是冬天？

en: What do you associate with summer?
zh: 你把什么和夏天联系起来？

en: Summer has come.
zh: 夏天来了。

en: The summer drew near to its end.
zh: 夏天接近尾声。

en: Plant these seeds before summer sets in.
zh: 在夏天来临之前种下这些种子。

en: The more we learn, the more we realize how little we know.
zh: 我们学得越多，就越意识到自己知道的越少。

en: You're never too old to learn.
zh: 活到老，学到老。

en: One is never too old to learn.
zh: 活到老，学到老。

en: No one is too old to learn.
zh: 活到老，学到老。

en: The man who stops learning is as good as dead.
zh: 停止学习的人和死了没什么区别。

en: The learned are apt to despise the ignorant.
zh: 有学问的人往往鄙视无知的人。

en: The revolutionary council met to plan strategy.
zh: 革命委员会开会制定战略。

en: After the revolution, France became a republic.
zh: 革命后，法国成为了共和国。

en: The revolution brought in a new era.
zh: 革命带来了一个新时代。

en: The revolution has brought about many changes.
zh: 革命带来了许多变化。

en: Every member of the cabinet was present.
zh: 内阁的每一位成员都出席了。

en: I'd like a room in the corner of the building.
zh: 我想要一间在建筑物角落的房间。

en: One lump of sugar, please.
zh: 请给我一块糖。

en: Please put a lump of sugar in my coffee.
zh: 请在我的咖啡里放一块糖。

en: As we went around the corner, the lake came in sight.
zh: 当我们转过弯时，湖泊进入了视线。

en: Round the corner came a large truck.
zh: 一辆大卡车转弯过来了。

en: You'll find the shop around the corner.
zh: 你会在拐角处找到那家商店。

en: There is a bookstore just 'round the corner.
zh: 拐角处就有一家书店。

en: Will you run down to the corner and buy me a paper?
zh: 你能跑到街角给我买份报纸吗？

en: There's a pub just around the corner.
zh: 拐角处就有一家酒吧。

en: The house on the corner is ours.
zh: 角落里的那栋房子是我们的。

en: I had my car filled up at the service station at the corner.
zh: 我在街角的加油站加满了油。

en: Not worth the remembered value.
zh: 不值得被记住的价值。

en: I will get even with you some day. Remember it.
zh: 总有一天我会报复你的。记住这一点。

en: I will get even with you some day.
zh: 总有一天我会报复你的。

en: My shoes are too small. I need new ones.
zh: 我的鞋太小了，我需要新的。

en: We're getting out of here. The cops are coming.
zh: 我们得离开这里，警察来了。

en: Merry Christmas!
zh: 圣诞快乐！

en: It would be so cool if I could speak ten languages!
zh: 如果我会说十种语言，那就太酷了！

en: "If you're tired, why don't you go to sleep?" "Because if I go to sleep now I will wake up too early."
zh: “如果你累了，为什么不去睡觉呢？” “因为如果我现在睡觉，我会醒得太早。”

en: You should have listened to me.
zh: 你应该听我的。

en: It's a complete mess, and it's getting on my nerves.
zh: 这完全是一团糟，真让我心烦。

en: When the body is touched, receptors in the skin send messages to the brain causing the release of chemicals such as endorphins.
zh: 当身体被触摸时，皮肤中的感受器会向大脑发送信息，导致内啡肽等化学物质的释放。

en: One hundred and fifty thousand couples are expected to get married in Shanghai in 2006.
zh: 预计2006年上海将有15万对新人结婚。

en: Half a million children still face malnutrition in Niger.
zh: 尼日尔仍有50万儿童面临营养不良。

en: Bicycles are tools for urban sustainability.
zh: 自行车是城市可持续发展的工具。

en: The French government has launched an online game that challenges taxpayers to balance the national budget.
zh: 法国政府推出了一款在线游戏，挑战纳税人平衡国家预算。

en: He would be glad to hear that.
zh: 他会很高兴听到这个消息的。

en: What do you believe is true even though you cannot prove it?
zh: 你相信什么是真的，即使你无法证明它？

en: Computers make people stupid.
zh: 电脑让人变笨。

en: Don't ask what they think. Ask what they do.
zh: 不要问他们怎么想，问他们怎么做。

en: When you're trying to prove something, it helps to know it's true.
zh: 当你试图证明某件事时，知道它是真的会有帮助。

en: What changes the world is communication, not information.
zh: 改变世界的是沟通，而不是信息。

en: Most scientific breakthroughs are nothing else than the discovery of the obvious.
zh: 大多数科学突破只不过是发现显而易见的事实。

en: If you don't understand something, it's because you aren't aware of its context.
zh: 如果你不理解某件事，那是因为你没有意识到它的背景。

en: The past can only be known, not changed. The future can only be changed, not known.
zh: 过去只能被了解，不能被改变。未来只能被改变，不能被了解。

en: The key question is not what can I gain but what do I have to lose.
zh: 关键问题不是我能得到什么，而是我必须失去什么。

en: Anything that can be misunderstood will be.
zh: 任何可能被误解的事都会被误解。

en: Why is life so full of suffering?
zh: 为什么生活充满了苦难？

en: Despite the importance of sleep, its purpose is a mystery.
zh: 尽管睡眠很重要，但它的目的仍然是个谜。

en: I groped for a flashlight.
zh: 我摸索着找手电筒。

en: She shone her torch onto the floor before us.
zh: 她用手电筒照着我们面前的地板。

en: Flashing lights transmit messages between ships and to motorists along city streets.
zh: 闪光灯在船只之间以及向城市街道上的驾车者传递信息。

en: I have plenty of money with me.
zh: 我身上带了很多钱。

en: The good old days have gone, never to return.
zh: 美好的旧时光已经一去不复返了。

en: I like to talk about the good old days.
zh: 我喜欢谈论美好的旧时光。

en: We're on our way home.
zh: 我们正在回家的路上。

en: The monster's smile was cruel.
zh: 那个怪物的笑容很残忍。

en: The Sphinx howled with rage.
zh: 狮身人面像愤怒地咆哮着。

en: Hearing the monster's footsteps, they began running in all directions.
zh: 听到怪物的脚步声，他们开始向四面八方跑去。

en: Cover up the injured man with this blanket.
zh: 用这条毯子盖住受伤的人。

en: You will hurt yourself.
zh: 你会伤到自己的。

en: Don't cry trouble half-way.
zh: 不要杞人忧天。

en: We could hear the groans of the injured man.
zh: 我们能听到受伤者的呻吟声。

en: An injury put the shortstop out of action.
zh: 一次受伤使游击手退出了比赛。

en: She fumbled with the glasses as she brought them in.
zh: 她端着杯子进来时，笨手笨脚的。

en: A good appetite, sound sleep, and regular motions are the three signs of good health.
zh: 良好的食欲、充足的睡眠和规律的排便是身体健康的三个标志。

en: Some people pursue only pleasure.
zh: 有些人只追求享乐。

en: She greeted me with a pleasant smile.
zh: 她用愉快的微笑迎接我。

en: Mere decay produces richer life.
zh: 仅仅是腐烂就能产生更丰富的生命。

en: Would you please replace the broken one promptly?
zh: 请您尽快更换破损的那个好吗？

en: I replaced the broken cups with new ones.
zh: 我用新的杯子替换了破损的杯子。

en: The broken window was boarded up.
zh: 破损的窗户被木板封了起来。

en: Cold blasts from the broken window chilled us.
zh: 从破损的窗户吹来的寒风让我们感到寒冷。

en: I fix broken radios.
zh: 我修理坏了的收音机。

en: You must judge for yourself.
zh: 你必须自己判断。

en: You need to have friends who can help you out.
zh: 你需要有能帮助你的朋友。

en: What do you base your theory on?
zh: 你的理论是基于什么？

en: You do your part and I'll do the rest.
zh: 你做你的那部分，剩下的我来做。

en: You must live up to your principles.
zh: 你必须坚持你的原则。

en: You should pay attention to your well-being.
zh: 你应该注意你的健康。

en: You are wearing your socks inside out.
zh: 你袜子穿反了。

en: You need not take off your shoes.
zh: 你不需要脱鞋。

en: I suppose you're hungry.
zh: 我想你饿了吧。

en: You needn't have hurried to the airport.
zh: 你本不必急着去机场。

en: Do you ever dream about flying through the sky?
zh: 你有没有梦见过在天空中飞翔？

en: Have you ever been to Kyushu?
zh: 你去过九州吗？

en: You must come back before nine o'clock.
zh: 你必须九点之前回来。

en: You can get a loan from a bank.
zh: 你可以从银行获得贷款。

en: You should make an effort to stop smoking.
zh: 你应该努力戒烟。

en: You had better not smoke while on duty.
zh: 你最好不要在工作时吸烟。

en: You've left out a word in copying the textbook.
zh: 你抄课本时漏了一个词。

en: Are you trying to fish in troubled waters?
zh: 你是想浑水摸鱼吗？

en: I think you had better take a rest.
zh: 我想你最好休息一下。

en: You have no need to hurry.
zh: 你不需要着急。

en: You need not have hurried.
zh: 你本不必着急。

en: You needn't have hurried; you've arrived too early.
zh: 你本不必着急，你来得太早了。

en: You'd better hurry up.
zh: 你最好快点。

en: Do you know who Rie Miyazawa is?
zh: 你知道宫泽理惠是谁吗？

en: Where are you going to spend the vacation?
zh: 你打算去哪里度假？

en: She managed to learn to drive a car.
zh: 她设法学会了开车。

en: I managed to find his office.
zh: 我设法找到了他的办公室。

en: Will you make every effort to come?
zh: 你会尽一切努力来吗？

en: I'll manage to fit you in next week.
zh: 我下周设法给你安排时间。

en: We just got to first base.
zh: 我们才刚刚开始。

en: I tried everything to keep him alive.
zh: 我尽了一切努力来救活他。

en: I'll get my son to wash my car somehow or other.
zh: 我总会有办法让我儿子洗我的车。

en: I hope I can manage to make both ends meet.
zh: 我希望能设法做到收支相抵。

en: Let's try to arrange something.
zh: 我们尽量安排一下。

en: Could you make time for me?
zh: 你能抽出时间给我吗？

en: Push the job and get it done this week.
zh: 加紧工作，这周完成它。

en: I managed to make myself understood in English.
zh: 我设法用英语表达清楚了自己的意思。

en: What a lovely doll!
zh: 多么可爱的娃娃啊！

en: I think I can handle it.
zh: 我想我能应付。

en: I'll work that into my tight schedule.
zh: 我会把那件事安排到我紧张的日程中。

en: We made it out of there.
zh: 我们从那里逃出来了。

en: Do something!
zh: 做点什么吧！

en: Get up as early as you possibly can.
zh: 尽可能早地起床。

en: Will you manage to repair my car?
zh: 你能修好我的车吗？

en: I was determined to fulfill my duties at any cost.
zh: 我决心不惜一切代价履行我的职责。

en: Catch as catch can.
zh: 各凭本事。

en: Can't you do something to help me?
zh: 你不能做点什么来帮我吗？

en: Please do something about it.
zh: 请你处理一下这件事。

en: I'll be there by eight somehow.
zh: 我无论如何都会在八点前到那里。

en: You should struggle so hard to make this program work.
zh: 你应该努力让这个程序运行起来。

en: Having finished all her housework, she sat down on the sofa to watch television.
zh: 做完所有家务后，她坐在沙发上看电视。

en: Lots of women both run a home and go out to work.
zh: 很多女性既要操持家务，又要外出工作。

en: I got him to help me when I moved the furniture.
zh: 搬家具的时候，我让他帮我。

en: The furniture was dusty.
zh: 家具很脏，都是灰尘。

en: All the furniture was covered with dust.
zh: 所有的家具都蒙上了灰尘。

en: Some furniture is put together with glue.
zh: 有些家具是用胶水粘合起来的。

en: The houses stand near to each other.
zh: 这些房子彼此相邻。

en: The fronts of the houses were hung with flags.
zh: 房子的正面挂满了旗帜。

en: The houses looked like so many matchboxes.
zh: 这些房子看起来像许多火柴盒。

en: There are a lot of persons who try to buy a house.
zh: 很多人都想买房子。

en: There are a great many people trying buy houses.
zh: 很多人都想买房子。

en: I mortgaged my house.
zh: 我抵押了我的房子。

en: We'll borrow some money on the house.
zh: 我们将以房子作抵押借一些钱。

en: I'm getting a new house built.
zh: 我正在盖一栋新房子。

en: Don't forget to turn off the gas before you leave the house.
zh: 离开房子前，别忘了关掉煤气。

en: Before you leave home, make sure your pets have enough food.
zh: 离家前，确保你的宠物有足够的食物。

en: The weather was lovely when I left home.
zh: 我离开家的时候天气很好。

en: I had no sooner left the house than it began to rain hard.
zh: 我刚离开家就开始下大雨。

en: I had hardly left home when it began raining.
zh: 我刚离开家就开始下雨。

en: As soon as I left home, it began to rain.
zh: 我一离开家就开始下雨。

en: I was leaving home when Tom telephoned me.
zh: 我正要离开家的时候，汤姆给我打了电话。

en: I had hardly left home when it began to rain heavily.
zh: 我刚离开家就开始下大雨。

en: As soon as I left home, I came across her in the street.
zh: 我一离开家，就在街上碰到了她。

en: As soon as I left home, I ran into her.
zh: 我一离开家就碰到了她。

en: As I left the house, I remembered the key.
zh: 我离开房子的时候，想起了钥匙。

en: You could also say that he's at the bottom of the class, for sure.
zh: 你也可以说他肯定是班里垫底的。

en: School uniforms are just out of fashion.
zh: 校服已经过时了。

en: The closing of school was due to the snow.
zh: 学校停课是因为下雪。

en: You must follow school rules.
zh: 你必须遵守校规。

en: I do a lot of work on the school newspaper.
zh: 我在校报上做了很多工作。

en: There is a bus stop near our school.
zh: 我们学校附近有一个公共汽车站。

en: Living near the school, I usually walk there.
zh: 因为住在学校附近，我通常走路去学校。

en: School discipline is not as it should be.
zh: 学校的纪律不太好。

en: I called at Nancy's house on my way home from school.
zh: 放学回家的路上，我顺便去了南希家。

en: We went on a school trip to Nara.
zh: 我们去奈良参加学校组织的旅行。

en: We went to Lake Towada on a school excursion.
zh: 我们去十和田湖参加学校组织的郊游。

en: I heard the school bell ring.
zh: 我听到了学校的铃声。

en: Though he lives within a stone's throw of the school, he is often late.
zh: 虽然他住在离学校很近的地方，但他经常迟到。

en: I'm going to join the school orchestra.
zh: 我打算加入学校的管弦乐队。

en: When the school had no books or paper or pencils, she wrote the alphabet on the ground with a stick.
zh: 当学校没有书、纸或铅笔时，她就用棍子在地上写字母。

en: It's up to you to get to school on time.
zh: 准时到校取决于你自己。

en: Arriving at school, I found the race was over.
zh: 当我到达学校时，我发现比赛已经结束了。

en: I cared for the rabbits when I was at school.
zh: 我在学校的时候照顾兔子。

en: Don't be late for school.
zh: 上学不要迟到。

en: You must not be late for school.
zh: 你一定不能上学迟到。

en: The number of students who were late for school was much smaller than I had expected.
zh: 上学迟到的学生人数比我预期的要少得多。

en: Some of the students were late for school.
zh: 有些学生上学迟到了。

en: I'm afraid we're going to be late for school.
zh: 恐怕我们要上学迟到了。

en: Your contribution to the school is tax-deductible.
zh: 你对学校的捐款可以免税。

en: I lost my purse on my way to school.
zh: 我在上学路上丢了钱包。

en: That's how it is.
zh: 就是这样。

en: Although I may be unhappy, I won't commit suicide.
zh: 就算我不开心，我也不会自杀。

en: I was the one who scratched it, but this kind of scratch is easy to fix.
zh: 是我刮的，不过这种刮痕很容易修复。

en: That's interesting.
zh: 真有意思。

en: Are you saying you intentionally hide your good looks?
zh: 你是说你故意隐藏你的美貌吗？

en: This isn't important.
zh: 这不重要。

en: Thank you for finally explaining to me why people take me for an idiot.
zh: 谢谢你终于向我解释了为什么人们认为我是个白痴。

en: That wasn't what I intended.
zh: 那不是我的本意。

en: Thank you for your explanation.
zh: 谢谢你的解释。

en: What happened?
zh: 发生什么事了？

en: What has happened?
zh: 发生什么事了？

en: I don't get what you mean.
zh: 我不明白你的意思。

en: I don't understand what you mean.
zh: 我不明白你的意思。

en: If you want to hear a scary story, I'll tell you about a dream I had a few weeks ago.
zh: 如果你想听一个恐怖故事，我可以给你讲讲我几周前做的一个梦。

en: You are not actually an idiot.
zh: 你其实不是个白痴。

en: I have a stupid question.
zh: 我有个愚蠢的问题。

en: Who knows?
zh: 谁知道呢？

en: That looks interesting.
zh: 那看起来很有趣。

en: This looks interesting.
zh: 这看起来很有趣。

en: How did you reply?
zh: 你怎么回复的？

en: What is the problem?
zh: 有什么问题？

en: The only thing we can do is wait.
zh: 我们唯一能做的就是等待。

en: I'm curious.
zh: 我很好奇。

en: What other options are there?
zh: 还有什么其他选择？

en: I don't like traveling all that much.
zh: 我不太喜欢旅行。

en: I will be glad, if I can be of any service to you.
zh: 如果我能帮到您，我将非常高兴。

en: I am wondering if I could be of any service to you.
zh: 我想知道我是否能帮到您。

en: Is there anything you can do?
zh: 有什么你能做的吗？

en: What led you to believe so?
zh: 是什么让您这样认为？

en: Is there anything that I can do for you?
zh: 有什么我可以为您效劳的吗？

en: I wish that I could give you something.
zh: 我希望我能给您一些东西。

en: What is it that "isn't only you"?
zh: “不仅仅是你”的是什么？

en: Nothing can ever stagger her belief.
zh: 没有什么能动摇她的信念。

en: Nothing will stop his going.
zh: 没有什么能阻止他去。

en: What prevented you from coming to the concert?
zh: 是什么阻止您来听音乐会？

en: I shall not change my mind, whatever happens.
zh: 无论发生什么事，我都不会改变主意。

en: Hey, what happened?
zh: 嘿，发生什么事了？

en: Please keep me informed.
zh: 请随时告知我情况。

en: If something happens, feel free to call me.
zh: 如果发生什么事，请随时给我打电话。

en: I have some idea of what happened.
zh: 我对发生的事情略知一二。

en: Please tell me what happened off the record, of course.
zh: 请告诉我发生了什么，当然，这是非正式的。

en: Is anything up?
zh: 有什么事吗？

en: Anything new?
zh: 有什么新鲜事吗？

en: Did you notice any change?
zh: 您注意到什么变化了吗？

en: Well, you have only to ask for his help.
zh: 嗯，你只需要请求他的帮助。

en: There is no point in pretending to be sick.
zh: 假装生病毫无意义。

en: We cannot conceive science without a hypothesis.
zh: 没有假设，我们就无法构思科学。

en: I have false nearsightedness.
zh: 我有假性近视。

en: Attached is the tentative agenda.
zh: 附件是暂定议程。

en: You'll need a temporary bridge.
zh: 你需要一个临时牙桥。

en: There are no pens on the desk.
zh: 桌子上没有笔。

en: There is a pen on the desk.
zh: 桌子上有一支笔。

en: Is there a pen on the desk?
zh: 桌子上有一支笔吗？

en: How many pens are there on the desk?
zh: 桌子上有几支笔？

en: Fan letters lay in a heap on the desk.
zh: 粉丝来信堆在桌子上。

en: The comic books were piled on the desk.
zh: 漫画书堆在桌子上。

en: There wasn't any book on the desk.
zh: 桌子上没有任何书。

en: Dust had accumulated on the desk.
zh: 桌子上积了灰尘。

en: There is only one book on the desk.
zh: 桌子上只有一本书。

en: There is a pair of scissors on the desk.
zh: 桌子上有一把剪刀。

en: There are several books on the desk.
zh: 桌子上有几本书。

en: There is a bag on the desk.
zh: 桌子上有一个包。

en: The word processor on the desk is my father's.
zh: 桌子上的文字处理机是我父亲的。

en: Look at that picture on the desk.
zh: 看看桌子上的那张照片。

en: There were no more than two books on the desk.
zh: 桌子上最多只有两本书。

en: There is a cat under the desk.
zh: 桌子下面有一只猫。

en: There is an apple under the desk.
zh: 桌子下面有一个苹果。

en: There are not any books under the desk.
zh: 桌子下面没有任何书。

en: Are there any books under the desk?
zh: 桌子下面有书吗？

en: A cat appeared from under the desk.
zh: 一只猫从桌子下面出现了。

en: The desk drawer is open.
zh: 桌子的抽屉是打开的。

en: I put down a rug under my desk.
zh: 我在桌子下面铺了一块地毯。

en: I fell asleep while studying at my desk.
zh: 我在书桌前学习时睡着了。

en: I am tied to my desk and chair.
zh: 我被束缚在我的桌子和椅子上。

en: Desk work is just not my cup of tea.
zh: 案头工作不是我喜欢的。

en: When you breathe out in cold weather, you can see your breath.
zh: 在寒冷的天气里呼气时，你可以看到你的呼吸。

en: I find it hard to get up early on cold mornings.
zh: 在寒冷的早晨，我发现很难早起。

en: It is difficult to wake up on cold mornings.
zh: 在寒冷的早晨很难醒来。

en: It's difficult to get the car going on cold mornings.
zh: 在寒冷的早晨很难启动汽车。

en: In cold weather we must be sure to keep our bodies warm.
zh: 在寒冷的天气里，我们必须确保身体保暖。

en: Those who are delicate in health are apt to catch a cold when the cold season sets in.
zh: 体弱的人在寒冷季节容易感冒。

en: Cold weather is coming.
zh: 寒冷的天气即将来临。

en: The cold climate affected his health.
zh: 寒冷的气候影响了他的健康。

en: We have had a long spell of cold weather.
zh: 我们已经经历了很长一段时间的寒冷天气。

en: It's cold. It was foolish of you not to bring your coat.
zh: 很冷。你不带外套真是太傻了。

en: I'm cold. May I close the window?
zh: 我很冷。我可以关上窗户吗？

en: It's cold so you should wear a coat.
zh: 很冷，所以你应该穿外套。

en: As it is cold, you may keep your overcoat on.
zh: 因为很冷，你可以穿着你的大衣。

en: I wonder if they don't have meetings anymore where strong words fly and everyone goes at each other tooth and nail.
zh: 我想知道他们是否不再举行会议，在会上大家激烈争论，互相攻击。

en: Bottoms up!
zh: 干杯！

en: I'm looking for batteries.
zh: 我在找电池。

en: It was all-or-nothing and we struck out spectacularly.
zh: 这是孤注一掷，结果我们惨败。

en: The dry season will set in soon.
zh: 旱季很快就要来临了。

en: Dry wood burns quickly.
zh: 干燥的木头燃烧得很快。

en: Dry sand absorbs water.
zh: 干燥的沙子吸收水分。

en: Bring me a dry towel.
zh: 给我拿一条干毛巾。

en: The Kamo runs through Kyoto.
zh: 鸭川流经京都。

en: The smell of cut grass summons up images of hot summer afternoons.
zh: 割草的味道让人想起炎热的夏日午后。

en: When I bite down, this tooth hurts.
zh: 当我咬东西的时候，这颗牙齿会疼。

en: Kamakura is a place noted in connection with the Genji family.
zh: 镰仓是一个与源氏家族有关的著名地方。

en: It has been raining since Tuesday.
zh: 从星期二开始就一直在下雨。

en: We must finish everything before Tuesday morning.
zh: 我们必须在星期二早上之前完成所有事情。

en: Gunpowder needs to be handled very carefully.
zh: 火药需要非常小心地处理。

en: It won't be long before we can travel to Mars.
zh: 不久之后我们就能去火星旅行了。

en: Mars is all the more interesting for its close resemblance to our Earth.
zh: 火星因其与地球的相似之处而更加引人入胜。

en: Mars resembles our planet in some ways.
zh: 火星在某些方面与我们的星球相似。

en: Mars is a promising place where we may be able to live.
zh: 火星是一个有希望的地方，我们也许能够在那里生活。

en: There is no sign of life on Mars.
zh: 火星上没有生命迹象。

en: It is said that there is no life on Mars.
zh: 据说火星上没有生命。

en: Is there any life on Mars?
zh: 火星上有生命吗？

en: He contends that primitive life once existed on Mars.
zh: 他认为火星上曾经存在过原始生命。

en: A burnt child fears the fire.
zh: 一朝被蛇咬，十年怕井绳。

en: A big crowd gathered at the scene of the fire.
zh: 一大群人聚集在火灾现场。

en: Their plot to start a fire was discovered by the police.
zh: 他们纵火的阴谋被警察发现了。

en: It was not easy to put out the fire at once.
zh: 要立即扑灭这场火灾并不容易。

en: The fire started in the bathhouse.
zh: 火灾是从澡堂开始的。

en: It transpired that fire was caused by a careless smoker.
zh: 结果发现火灾是由一个粗心的吸烟者引起的。

en: The fire went on for some time before it was brought under control.
zh: 火势持续了一段时间才得到控制。

en: Fire cannot be prevented by half measures.
zh: 半途而废无法预防火灾。

en: The fire was put out before it got serious.
zh: 火灾在变得严重之前就被扑灭了。

en: The fire broke out toward midnight.
zh: 火灾在午夜时分爆发。

en: The fire was put out at the cost of a fireman's life.
zh: 扑灭这场火灾的代价是一位消防员的生命。

en: The fire was extinguished at once.
zh: 火灾立即被扑灭了。

en: The fire broke out after the staff went home.
zh: 火灾发生在员工下班后。

en: A fire broke out on the first floor.
zh: 一楼发生了火灾。

en: Get out.
zh: 滚出去。

en: May I go out to play?
zh: 我可以出去玩吗？

en: No sooner had I gone out than it began to rain.
zh: 我刚一出门，天就开始下雨了。

en: I stepped outside and was bathed in the harsh direct sunlight.
zh: 我走到外面，沐浴在刺眼的阳光下。

en: As soon as I went out, it began to rain.
zh: 我刚一出门，天就开始下雨了。

en: I shivered with cold when I went outside.
zh: 我走到外面，冷得直打哆嗦。

en: He would not go out.
zh: 他不愿意出门。

en: Could you let him out?
zh: 你能让他出去吗？

en: He is playing outdoors.
zh: 他在户外玩。

en: A sudden loud noise broke in on my meditation.
zh: 一声突如其来的巨响打断了我的冥想。

en: I hear footsteps outside.
zh: 我听到外面有脚步声。

en: The cold north wind was roaring outside.
zh: 寒冷的北风在外面呼啸。

en: Please invite us out to dinner.
zh: 请邀请我们出去吃饭。

en: The sky is getting light.
zh: 天快亮了。

en: I don't like to cook when it's hot outside.
zh: 外面热的时候，我不喜欢做饭。

en: Don't stay indoors because it is cold outside.
zh: 外面冷，别待在室内。

en: I couldn't sleep well because it was noisy outside.
zh: 因为外面太吵了，我睡不好。

en: I don't like shellfish.
zh: 我不喜欢贝类。

en: I missed a step on the stairs and I'm afraid I sprained my ankle.
zh: 我上楼梯时踩空了一步，恐怕扭伤了脚踝。

en: He called his father as he went up the stairs.
zh: 他上楼时给父亲打了电话。

en: Go up the stairs.
zh: 上楼。

en: I'm out of breath after running up the stairs.
zh: 跑上楼梯后，我气喘吁吁。

en: Watch your step in going down the stairs.
zh: 下楼梯时小心。

en: I fell down the stairs and hit my back very hard.
zh: 我从楼梯上摔下来，背部狠狠地撞了一下。

en: The hierarchy of rank has long been fixed.
zh: 等级制度早已固定。

en: Mr Yoshida is too severe with his children.
zh: 吉田先生对他的孩子们太严厉了。

en: Take your time, Yoshida.
zh: 慢慢来，吉田。

en: Hello, I have a reservation, my name is Kaori Yoshikawa. Here is the confirmation card.
zh: 你好，我有一个预订，我叫吉川香织。这是确认卡。

en: Chrysanthemums smell sweet.
zh: 菊花闻起来很香。

en: Let's carry on the discussion.
zh: 我们继续讨论吧。

en: He is second to none when it comes to debating.
zh: 说到辩论，他无人能及。

en: The discussion was heated.
zh: 讨论很激烈。

en: Discussion is based upon mutual respect.
zh: 讨论是建立在相互尊重的基础上的。

en: The argument ended in a fight.
zh: 争论以打架告终。

en: All the arguments pointed in the same direction.
zh: 所有的论点都指向同一个方向。

en: My argument is indebted in a number of places to the aesthetic theories of Adorno, Horkheimer and others.
zh: 我的论点在很多地方都借鉴了阿多诺、霍克海默等人的美学理论。

en: The essential points of my argument have been expressed in the preceding pages.
zh: 我的论点的要点已经在前面的章节中表达过了。

en: The bell went off right in the middle of our discussion.
zh: 铃声在我们讨论的正中间响了。

en: Let's not argue for the sake of arguing.
zh: 我们不要为了争论而争论。

en: Imagine, for the sake of argument, a tribal group in which mother-son incest was countenanced.
zh: 为了便于讨论，假设有一个部落允许母子乱伦。

en: No one could get the better of him in an argument.
zh: 在辩论中，没有人能胜过他。

en: Women will have the last word.
zh: 女人会是最后发言的人。

en: It is hardly worth discussing.
zh: 这不值得讨论。

en: After they argued, they didn't speak to each other for a week.
zh: 他们吵架后，一个星期没跟对方说话。

en: The discussion produced a great deal of noise, but no forward motion.
zh: 讨论产生了很多噪音，但没有取得任何进展。

en: The chairman rejected his absurd proposal.
zh: 主席否决了他荒谬的提议。

en: The chairman resigned out of the blue.
zh: 主席突然辞职了。

en: The chairperson ordered silence.
zh: 主席命令大家安静。

en: The chairman should take the minority opinion into account.
zh: 主席应该考虑少数人的意见。

en: The chairman would only make her comments off the record.
zh: 主席只会私下发表她的评论。

en: Above all, try to be kind to the old.
zh: 最重要的是，要善待老人。

en: Above all, watch your diet.
zh: 最重要的是，注意你的饮食。

en: Above all, you must help each other.
zh: 最重要的是，你们必须互相帮助。

en: Above all, I want to see him again.
zh: 最重要的是，我想再见到他。

en: Above all, take care of yourself.
zh: 最重要的是，照顾好自己。

en: Are you sure you haven't forgotten anything?
zh: 你确定你没有忘记什么吗？

en: Not having heard from him, I wrote to him again.
zh: 因为没有收到他的来信，我又给他写了信。

en: That won't change anything.
zh: 那不会改变任何事情。

en: You have nothing to fear.
zh: 你没有什么好害怕的。

en: You have no need to be ashamed.
zh: 你没有必要感到羞愧。

en: It is no use your pretending that you know nothing.
zh: 你假装你什么都不知道是没有用的。

en: Having nothing, nothing can he lose.
zh: 一无所有，他也就没有什么可以失去的。

en: There is nothing to worry about.
zh: 没有什么好担心的。

en: Nothing can force me to give it up.
zh: 没有什么能迫使我放弃它。

en: There is no hurry.
zh: 不着急。

en: I could not see anything.
zh: 我什么也看不见。

en: I have no real intent.
zh: 我没有真正的意图。

en: Nothing's gonna change my world.
zh: 没有什么会改变我的世界。

en: Those who possess nothing lose nothing.
zh: 一无所有的人，也就没有什么可以失去的。

en: Above all, I want to be healthy.
zh: 最重要的是，我想身体健康。

en: Nothing is to be compared to its beauty.
zh: 没有什么能与它的美丽相比。

en: I don't feel like anything.
zh: 我什么都不想做。

en: Having nothing to do, he went downtown.
zh: 因为没事可做，他去了市中心。

en: Having nothing to do, I watched television.
zh: 因为没事可做，我看电视了。

en: There's nothing to do, so I may as well go to bed.
zh: 没什么事可做，所以我最好去睡觉了。

en: We bought the goods at $3 a dozen.
zh: 我们以每打3美元的价格购买了这些货物。

en: We will crop the field with cotton this year.
zh: 今年我们将在田里种植棉花。

en: We would play baseball after school in those days.
zh: 那些日子里，我们放学后会打棒球。

en: We captured the thief.
zh: 我们抓住了小偷。

en: Let's ally ourselves to that group.
zh: 让我们和那个团体结盟。

en: We are liable for the damage.
zh: 我们对损失负有责任。

en: We marveled at the little boy's eloquence.
zh: 我们惊叹于那个小男孩的口才。

en: We saw the lady carried away to the hospital.
zh: 我们看到那位女士被送往医院。

en: We supply parts to the auto manufacturer.
zh: 我们向汽车制造商供应零件。

en: We were not prepared for the assault.
zh: 我们没有为这次袭击做好准备。

en: We didn't actually see the accident.
zh: 我们实际上没有看到事故发生。

en: We went on talking about the matter.
zh: 我们继续谈论这件事。

en: We actually saw the accident.
zh: 我们确实看到了事故发生。

en: We took a turn around the city in our car.
zh: 我们开车在城市里转了一圈。

en: We lost on that job.
zh: 我们在那项工作上赔钱了。

en: We were watching the child at play.
zh: 我们当时正在看孩子玩耍。

en: We had native guides on our trip to the mountain.
zh: 我们去那座山旅行时有当地向导。

en: We climbed up the mountain, but with difficulty.
zh: 我们爬上了山，但很困难。

en: We have established friendly relations with the new government of that country.
zh: 我们已经与该国新政府建立了友好关系。

en: We voted for the candidate.
zh: 我们投票支持了这位候选人。

en: We stayed at a hotel by the lake.
zh: 我们住在湖边的一家旅馆。

en: We camped on the border of the lake.
zh: 我们在湖的边界露营。

en: We fail to grasp the meaning of the word.
zh: 我们无法理解这个词的含义。

en: We found a secret passage into the building.
zh: 我们发现了一条通往大楼的秘密通道。

en: We found a secret door into the building.
zh: 我们发现了一扇通往大楼的暗门。

en: Diplomats are allowed various privileges.
zh: 外交官享有各种特权。

en: I am no match for him in diplomatic shrewdness.
zh: 在外交手腕上，我不是他的对手。

en: You must not rely too much on appearance.
zh: 你不能太依赖外表。

en: Don't be deceived by appearances.
zh: 不要被外表迷惑。

en: He deceives others with his appearance.
zh: 他用外表欺骗别人。

en: Don't judge a man by his appearance.
zh: 不要以貌取人。

en: Don't judge a person by his appearance.
zh: 不要以貌取人。

en: Judge him by what he does, not by his appearance.
zh: 根据他的行为来判断他，而不是外表。

en: We cannot separate the sheep from the goats by appearance.
zh: 我们不能通过外表来区分绵羊和山羊。

en: No matter how we try, it is impossible to distinguish good people from bad people by outward appearances.
zh: 无论我们怎么努力，都不可能通过外表来区分好人和坏人。

en: Judging from her appearance, she seems to be very rich.
zh: 从她的外表来看，她似乎很富有。

en: One cannot judge people only by their outward appearances.
zh: 人不可貌相。

en: Judging from his appearance, he is ill.
zh: 从他的外表来看，他生病了。

en: Judging from his appearance, he must be the conductor.
zh: 从他的外表来看，他一定是指挥。

en: The air felt a little cold.
zh: 空气感觉有点冷。

en: Appearance is deceptive.
zh: 人不可貌相。

en: The exchange rates for foreign currency change daily.
zh: 外币汇率每天都在变化。

en: The surgeon persuaded me to undergo an organ transplant operation.
zh: 外科医生说服我接受器官移植手术。

en: The surgeon took out his patient's appendix.
zh: 外科医生取出了病人的阑尾。

en: The surgeon persuaded him to undergo an organ transplant.
zh: 外科医生说服他接受器官移植。

en: The surgeon persuaded me to undergo an operation.
zh: 外科医生说服我接受手术。

en: Please go to the Surgery Department.
zh: 请去外科。

en: Shine your shoes before going out.
zh: 出门前把鞋擦亮。

en: I felt a chill when I went out of the house.
zh: 我走出家门时感到一阵寒意。

en: Once outside, I gave a deep sigh of relief.
zh: 一到外面，我就深深地叹了口气，如释重负。

en: It's none of your business.
zh: 这不关你的事。

en: Mind your own business!
zh: 管好你自己的事！

en: When is your birthday?
zh: 你的生日是什么时候？

en: I will give you a bicycle for your birthday.
zh: 我会在你生日的时候送你一辆自行车。

en: Your birthday is drawing near.
zh: 你的生日快到了。

en: You shall have a bicycle for your birthday.
zh: 你生日的时候会有一辆自行车。

en: I'll find someone to fill in for you.
zh: 我会找人来代替你。

en: Aren't you being very rude?
zh: 你是不是太无礼了？

en: There's no room for excuses when it comes to your negligence, is there?
zh: 你的疏忽没有任何借口，对吧？

en: Your son has come of age.
zh: 你的儿子已经成年了。

en: Your son took part in the student movement, I hear.
zh: 我听说你的儿子参加了学生运动。

en: Is this your son, Betty?
zh: 这位是你的儿子吗，贝蒂？

en: I cannot accept your gift.
zh: 我不能接受你的礼物。

en: I'm fed up with your constant complaining.
zh: 我受够了你没完没了的抱怨。

en: What's your major field?
zh: 你的专业是什么？

en: Your explanation won't wash; it's too improbable to be true.
zh: 你的解释站不住脚；太不可信了。

en: Your explanation sounds plausible, but it just doesn't hold water.
zh: 你的解释听起来似乎有道理，但根本经不起推敲。

en: Go back to your seat.
zh: 回到你的座位上去。

en: You may have good reason to think that your youth is over.
zh: 你可能有充分的理由认为你的青春已经结束了。

en: I can hear you, but I can't see you.
zh: 我能听到你的声音，但我看不到你。

en: Your voice carries well.
zh: 你的声音很洪亮。

en: I don't for a moment doubt your honesty.
zh: 我毫不怀疑你的诚实。

en: Your policy is mistaken.
zh: 你的政策是错误的。

en: Your marks were well below average this term.
zh: 你这学期的分数远低于平均水平。

en: I was glad to hear of your success.
zh: 我很高兴听到你成功了。

en: Admitting what you say, I still think that you were wrong.
zh: 就算你说的有道理，我仍然认为你是错的。

en: I admit that what you say is true, but I don't like the way you say it.
zh: 我承认你说的没错，但我不喜欢你说话的方式。

en: Though I admit what you say, I still think you are wrong.
zh: 即使我承认你说的，我仍然认为你是错的。

en: Admitting what you say, I still think I am right.
zh: 就算你说的有道理，我仍然认为我是对的。

en: While I accept what you say, I still think I'm right.
zh: 即使我接受你说的，我仍然认为我是对的。

en: Admitting what you say, I still think you are mistaken.
zh: 就算你说的有道理，我仍然认为你搞错了。

en: Admitting what you say, I still think you are in the wrong.
zh: 就算你说的有道理，我仍然认为你是不对的。

en: I can not make out at all what you say.
zh: 我完全听不懂你在说什么。

en: You may be right.
zh: 也许你是对的。

en: What you say is right.
zh: 你说的是对的。

en: I find it difficult to believe.
zh: 我很难相信。

en: Your words must correspond with your actions.
zh: 言行要一致。

en: Aren't you pushing it too far?
zh: 你是不是太过分了？

en: While I see what you say, I can't accept your offer.
zh: 虽然我明白你说的，但我不能接受你的提议。

en: What you say is quite wide of the mark.
zh: 你说的完全不着边际。

en: You are off the point.
zh: 你离题了。

en: All that you say is perfectly correct.
zh: 你说的完全正确。

en: What you say is usually true.
zh: 你说的通常是真的。

en: What you say is quite different from what I heard from him.
zh: 你说的和我从他那里听到的完全不同。

en: I can't see what you mean.
zh: 我不明白你的意思。

en: You should pay more attention to what you say.
zh: 你应该更注意你所说的话。

en: There is much truth in what you say.
zh: 你说的很有道理。

en: I can make nothing of what you do or say.
zh: 我完全不明白你做或说什么。

en: If what you say is true, it follows that he has an alibi.
zh: 如果你的话是真的，那就意味着他有不在场证明。

en: I don't follow.
zh: 我不明白。

en: We communicated with each other by gesture.
zh: 我们用手势互相交流。

en: We bought a pound of tea.
zh: 我们买了一磅茶叶。

en: We partook in each other's joy.
zh: 我们分享彼此的快乐。

en: We agreed among ourselves.
zh: 我们私下达成了协议。

en: We use gestures as well as words to communicate with others.
zh: 我们用手势和语言与他人交流。

en: We kept track of all our expenses while we were in Australia.
zh: 我们在澳大利亚的时候，记录了所有的开销。

en: We received a large parcel.
zh: 我们收到一个大包裹。

en: We went up and down by elevator.
zh: 我们乘电梯上下。

en: We mustn't waste our energy resources.
zh: 我们不能浪费能源。

en: We must reduce energy demand.
zh: 我们必须减少能源需求。

en: We spoke about many subjects.
zh: 我们谈论了很多话题。

en: We can communicate with each other in many ways.
zh: 我们可以用很多方式互相交流。

en: We talked of many things.
zh: 我们谈了很多事情。

en: We should always keep our promise.
zh: 我们应该永远信守承诺。

en: We should always act in obedience to the law.
zh: 我们应该永远遵守法律。

en: We must always stand up for our rights.
zh: 我们必须永远捍卫我们的权利。

en: We are always exposed to some kind of danger.
zh: 我们总是暴露在某种危险之中。

en: We had an early lunch and set out at 12:30.
zh: 我们吃了早午餐，并在12点30分出发。

en: We started all at once.
zh: 我们一下子都开始了。

en: We will someday make the world a better place.
zh: 我们总有一天会让世界变得更美好。

en: We shall all die some day.
zh: 我们总有一天都会死的。

en: We will run short of oil some day.
zh: 我们总有一天会面临石油短缺。

en: We hired a car for a week when we were in Italy.
zh: 我们在意大利的时候租了一辆车，租期一周。

en: We must achieve our aim at any price.
zh: 我们必须不惜一切代价实现我们的目标。

en: We have every advantage over them.
zh: 我们比他们有各种优势。

en: I draw for a hobby.
zh: 我画画是出于爱好。

en: Drawing is a lot of fun; it helps me to relax.
zh: 画画很有趣，它能帮助我放松。

en: Look at the picture.
zh: 看看这张画。

en: How many pictures did you buy?
zh: 你买了多少张画？

en: The picture looks better at a distance.
zh: 这幅画远看更好看。

en: Is the picture straight?
zh: 这幅画正吗？

en: I'm going to France to study painting.
zh: 我要去法国学习绘画。

en: Everybody in the picture is smiling happily.
zh: 照片里的每个人都笑得很开心。

en: The girl in the picture is wearing a crown not of gold but of flowers.
zh: 照片里的女孩戴着一顶不是金子而是鲜花做的王冠。

en: You must not touch the paintings.
zh: 请勿触摸画作。

en: Never confuse art with life.
zh: 永远不要把艺术和生活混淆。

en: The picture is hung crooked.
zh: 这幅画挂歪了。

en: The picture hangs over the table.
zh: 这幅画挂在桌子上方。

en: Strange to say, all the lights in the house were on, though no one was at home.
zh: 说来奇怪，虽然家里没人，但所有的灯都亮着。

en: May I begin by thanking every one for your warm welcome?
zh: 首先，请允许我感谢大家的热烈欢迎。

en: May I have your attention, please?
zh: 请大家注意一下。

en: Excuse us for the inconvenience.
zh: 给您带来不便，请原谅。

en: I esteem it an honor to address this audience.
zh: 我很荣幸能向各位听众讲话。

en: May you all be happy.
zh: 祝大家幸福。

en: I don't have the slightest idea.
zh: 我一点头绪都没有。

en: All were satisfied.
zh: 大家都满意了。

en: Everyone says that he's a good man.
zh: 大家都说他是个好人。

en: Everybody was disguised, so I couldn't tell who was who.
zh: 每个人都乔装打扮了，所以我认不出谁是谁。

en: They regarded him as the best doctor in town.
zh: 他们认为他是镇上最好的医生。

en: Everybody seems to pay attention to what he says.
zh: 似乎每个人都注意听他说什么。

en: A record number of shares changed hands in busy trading as prices soared to a historic high.
zh: 交易活跃，成交量创历史新高，股价也飙升至历史最高点。

en: Stock prices dropped.
zh: 股价下跌了。

en: Stocks hit a new high.
zh: 股票创下新高。

en: What a fool she is to dabble in stocks!
zh: 她真是个傻瓜，竟然涉足股市！

en: He was a stock-market tycoon until the bears got him.
zh: 他曾经是股市大亨，直到熊市让他一败涂地。

en: I lost my shirt on the stock market.
zh: 我在股市里赔得精光。

en: It was careless of you to leave your bag.
zh: 你把包落在这里太粗心了。

en: Stick the bag down under the seat.
zh: 把包塞到座位下面。

en: Will you open the bag?
zh: 你能打开这个包吗？

en: You may leave your bag here.
zh: 你可以把包放在这里。

en: I need a bag. Will you lend me one?
zh: 我需要一个包。你能借我一个吗？

en: Kasai was credited with 30 saves.
zh: 葛西功劳卓著，完成了30次扑救。

en: He was in the middle of a funny story when he stopped to answer the telephone.
zh: 他正讲到一个有趣的故事，突然停下来接电话。

en: Well begun is half done.
zh: 好的开始是成功的一半。

en: The eagle does not catch flies.
zh: 雄鹰不捉苍蝇。

en: Activists are stepping up their protest drive.
zh: 活动人士正在加大抗议力度。

en: Activity keeps the mind from rusting.
zh: 活动能防止大脑生锈。

en: The boy was bored with home routines that were dull and unchanging.
zh: 这个男孩厌倦了单调乏味的家庭生活。

en: I think it's a good thing because it keep us on our toes.
zh: 我认为这是件好事，因为它能让我们保持警惕。

en: The appropriation is pin-money; it wouldn't be enough even to build a gym, much less build the administration building.
zh: 这笔拨款只是小钱；即使建一个健身房都不够，更别说建行政大楼了。

en: Don't step on the broken glass.
zh: 不要踩到碎玻璃。

en: You must perform all assignments in a timely manner.
zh: 你必须按时完成所有任务。

en: How much was the additional charge?
zh: 额外费用是多少？

en: Don't cut in line.
zh: 不要插队。

en: Let's split it.
zh: 我们平分吧。

en: How often have you been to Europe?
zh: 你去过欧洲几次？

en: Having failed several times, he tried to do it again.
zh: 失败了几次后，他又尝试去做。

en: I got sucked in on a lot of phony deals.
zh: 我被卷入了很多虚假的交易中。

en: I got several bites, but could not hook a fish.
zh: 我得到了几次咬钩，但没能钓到鱼。

en: How often is it necessary to feed your pet?
zh: 你多久需要喂一次你的宠物？

en: Which station are you going to?
zh: 你要去哪个站？

en: Some of the birds didn't fly.
zh: 有些鸟没有飞。

en: What you're talking about is more important than how you say it.
zh: 你所说的比你怎么说更重要。

en: What's biting you?
zh: 你怎么了？/什么事让你烦恼？

en: What did you buy?
zh: 你买了什么？

en: You have to read between the lines to get the most out of anything.
zh: 你必须理解字里行间的意思才能充分理解任何事物。

en: What are you reading?
zh: 你在读什么？

en: What are you cross about?
zh: 你在为什么生气？

en: What was stolen?
zh: 什么东西被偷了？

en: What was it I left behind?
zh: 我把什么东西落下了？

en: What shall I go in?
zh: 我该穿什么去？

en: It's not what you wear, it's how you wear it.
zh: 重要的不是你穿什么，而是你怎么穿。

en: What're you waiting for?
zh: 你在等什么？

en: What are you concerned about?
zh: 你在担心什么？

en: What's your major?
zh: 你主修什么专业？

en: What are you laughing at?
zh: 你在笑什么？

en: What should I eat?
zh: 我应该吃什么？

en: What trifles are you making a great fuss about?
zh: 你在为什么小事大惊小怪？

en: We disputed for hours about what to write.
zh: 我们争论了几个小时该写什么。

en: You should make sure of the facts before you write something.
zh: 在写东西之前，你应该先确认事实。

en: Poor as he is, he is generous.
zh: 他虽然穷，但是很慷慨。

en: Money is welcome everywhere.
zh: 钱在任何地方都受欢迎。

en: There is a lot of money.
zh: 有很多钱。

en: I have some money with me.
zh: 我身上带了些钱。

en: I wouldn't like to be in his position, for all his wealth.
zh: 就算他再有钱，我也不想处在他的位置。

en: Gold is more precious than any other metal.
zh: 黄金比任何其他金属都珍贵。

en: Don't kill the goose that lays the golden eggs.
zh: 不要杀掉下金蛋的鹅。

en: I feel the want of money.
zh: 我感到缺钱。

en: The price of gold varies from day to day.
zh: 黄金的价格每天都在变化。

en: The end of money is the end of love.
zh: 钱尽情绝。

en: I have no money on me.
zh: 我身上没带钱。

en: As soon as there is any talk of paying, he cools down.
zh: 一说到付钱，他就退缩了。

en: The price of gold fluctuates daily.
zh: 黄金的价格每天都在波动。

en: It is certain that the price of gold will go up.
zh: 黄金的价格肯定会上涨。

en: We had a bar of gold stolen.
zh: 我们被偷了一块金条。

en: Money doesn't grow on trees, you know.
zh: 钱不是从树上长出来的，你知道。

en: I am short of money.
zh: 我缺钱。

en: Send me the best employees that money can buy. Money is no object.
zh: 给我派来能用钱买到的最好的员工。钱不是问题。

en: I'm not pressed for money.
zh: 我不缺钱。

en: Money is the last thing he wants.
zh: 钱是他最不想要的东西。

en: Money and I are strangers; in other words, I am poor.
zh: 我和钱是陌路人；换句话说，我很穷。

en: Power and money are inseparable.
zh: 权力和金钱是分不开的。

en: Money cannot compensate for life.
zh: 金钱无法补偿生命。

en: Money soon goes.
zh: 钱很快就会花光。

en: Money cannot buy happiness.
zh: 金钱买不到幸福。

en: I have some acquaintance with chemistry.
zh: 我对化学略知一二。

en: I would like to consider the implications we can draw from the application of Emmet's theory to chemistry.
zh: 我想考虑一下将埃米特理论应用于化学可能产生的意义。

en: He is a mean fellow.
zh: 他是个卑鄙的家伙。

en: Here's some medicine for diarrhea.
zh: 这是治疗腹泻的药。

en: I have a touch of diarrhea.
zh: 我有点拉肚子。

en: I have diarrhea.
zh: 我拉肚子。

en: My lower abdomen feels bloated.
zh: 我的下腹部感觉胀胀的。

en: He haunts the lowest resorts.
zh: 他经常出没于最下等的场所。

en: Did you do your homework? The meeting is only two days away.
zh: 你做作业了吗？会议只有两天了。

en: I got soaked to the skin.
zh: 我浑身湿透了。

en: You can wear your undershirt.
zh: 你可以穿你的内衣。

en: Translate the underlined part.
zh: 翻译划线部分。

en: Correct the underlined words.
zh: 更正划线的词语。

en: Translate the underlined sentences.
zh: 翻译划线的句子。

en: The drain is running freely.
zh: 排水管畅通无阻。

en: The drains are blocked up.
zh: 排水管堵塞了。

en: The boarders are now away on vacation.
zh: 寄宿生现在都去度假了。

en: A bad workman quarrels with his tools.
zh: 拙匠常怪工具差。

en: Take care not to make a foolish move.
zh: 小心不要做出愚蠢的举动。

en: A bad workman complains of his tools.
zh: 拙匠常怪工具差。

en: A bad workman always blames his tools.
zh: 拙匠总是抱怨工具不好。

en: We wish to advise you of the following price reductions.
zh: 我们谨此通知您以下降价信息。

en: We shipped the following to you last week.
zh: 我们上周已将以下物品发货给您。

en: I'd like a quote on the following.
zh: 我想询价以下物品。

en: Simply follow the instructions below, and in no time you will be printing full color documents just as easily and quickly as black and white.
zh: 只需按照以下说明操作，您很快就能像打印黑白文档一样轻松快捷地打印全彩色文档。

en: That church on the hill is very old.
zh: 山上的那座教堂很古老。

en: Situated on a hill, his house commands a fine view.
zh: 他的房子坐落在山上，视野极佳。

en: Standing as it does on a hill, the hotel commands a fine view of the bay.
zh: 酒店坐落在山上，可以俯瞰海湾的美景。

en: Look at that tower standing on the hill.
zh: 看看山上矗立的那座塔。

en: Look at that building standing on the hill.
zh: 看看山上矗立的那栋建筑。

en: There stands a beautiful church on the hill.
zh: 山上矗立着一座美丽的教堂。

en: The house which stands on the hill is very old.
zh: 山上的那栋房子很古老。

en: Are there oak trees on the hill?
zh: 山上有没有橡树？

en: There is a large house on the hill.
zh: 山上有一栋大房子。

en: There is a house on the hill.
zh: 山上有一栋房子。

en: His house was in sight from the top of the hill.
zh: 从山顶可以看到他的房子。

en: From the hill, we could see all the buildings in the city.
zh: 从山上，我们可以看到城市里的所有建筑物。

en: Lots of campers were parked all over the hill-side.
zh: 许多露营者把车停在山坡上。

en: A beautiful valley lies behind the hill.
zh: 山后有一个美丽的山谷。

en: We came in sight of the hill.
zh: 我们看到了那座山。

en: At the foot of the hill is a beautiful lake.
zh: 山脚下是一个美丽的湖泊。

en: Lots of low trees grow on the hill.
zh: 山上长着许多矮树。

en: We can get a beautiful view of the sea from the hill.
zh: 从山上我们可以看到美丽的海景。

en: My neck snapped when I did a headstand.
zh: 我倒立的时候脖子扭断了。

en: Paradoxically, he is right.
zh: 矛盾的是，他是对的。

en: She carries on smiling even in the face of adversity.
zh: 即使面对逆境，她仍然保持微笑。

en: Despite adversity, the ingenious man achieved worldwide fame.
zh: 尽管身处逆境，这位才华横溢的人还是获得了世界性的声誉。

en: Despite adversity, the architect achieved worldwide fame.
zh: 尽管身处逆境，这位建筑师还是获得了世界性的声誉。

en: Adversity is the best school.
zh: 逆境是最好的学校。

en: The converse is also true.
zh: 反之亦然。

en: The meeting was all but over.
zh: 会议几乎结束了。

en: How did you enjoy the party?
zh: 你觉得派对怎么样？

en: The meeting finished at nine.
zh: 会议九点结束了。

en: The meeting broke up at five.
zh: 会议五点散会了。

en: The meeting started at ten.
zh: 会议十点开始。

en: The meeting was well attended.
zh: 会议出席人数很多。

en: Prior to the meeting, they had dinner.
zh: 在开会之前，他们吃了晚餐。

en: Ask him if he will attend the meeting.
zh: 问问他是否会参加会议。

en: You do not really understand a man till you have met him.
zh: 你只有见过一个人，才能真正了解他。

en: It's not until you have met him that you really understand a man.
zh: 只有见过他，你才能真正了解他。

en: I wonder if you could find some time to see me.
zh: 我想知道你是否能抽出时间见我一面。

en: It was around eight last night when the meeting broke up.
zh: 会议大约在昨晚八点左右结束。

en: Whenever they meet, they quarrel.
zh: 他们一见面就吵架。

en: I never see her without wanting to kiss her.
zh: 每次见到她，我都想吻她。

en: Nice seeing you!
zh: 很高兴见到你！

en: It's been nice meeting you.
zh: 很高兴认识你。

en: I'm glad to see you.
zh: 很高兴见到你。

en: We never meet without parting.
zh: 我们每次见面都要分别。

en: It is nice of you to come and see me.
zh: 你来看我真是太好了。

en: Every time I go to see him, he is in bed.
zh: 每次我去看他，他都在床上。

en: You may bring anyone you want.
zh: 你可以带任何你想带的人来。

en: It is Tom whom I want to see.
zh: 我想见的人是汤姆。

en: When we were on the brink of starvation, they saved our lives.
zh: 当我们濒临饿死的时候，他们救了我们的命。

en: The buds are just showing.
zh: 花蕾刚开始显现。

en: Please advise us, if possible, of a company which has developed image processing software.
zh: 如果可能的话，请告知我们一家开发了图像处理软件的公司。

en: In summer it is essential to drink lots of water when we sweat.
zh: 夏天出汗时，一定要多喝水。

en: The summer is over.
zh: 夏天结束了。

en: My plan for the summer is to go to Europe.
zh: 我夏天的计划是去欧洲。

en: Nothing beats a big glass of beer in summer.
zh: 夏天没有什么比一大杯啤酒更棒的了。

en: In summer, eggs soon go bad.
zh: 夏天鸡蛋很快就会变质。

en: During summers, I used to go to Miami.
zh: 夏天的时候，我经常去迈阿密。

en: There is nothing like ice cream in the summer.
zh: 夏天没有什么比冰淇淋更让人喜欢的了。

en: Summer is the season when women look most beautiful.
zh: 夏天是女性看起来最美的季节。

en: My father implied our summer trip was arranged.
zh: 我父亲暗示我们的夏季旅行已经安排好了。

en: We cannot sleep well on summer nights.
zh: 夏天晚上我们睡不好觉。

en: In late summer and autumn one can see the leaves change colour.
zh: 夏末和秋天可以看到树叶变色。

en: There are more cars on the road in the summer than in the winter.
zh: 夏天路上的车比冬天多。

en: Summer days can be very, very hot.
zh: 夏天的日子可能非常非常热。

en: My summer school dress is blue and white checkered.
zh: 我的暑期学校的连衣裙是蓝白格子的。

en: I was in London most of the summer.
zh: 整个夏天我大部分时间都在伦敦。

en: The summer sun glared down on us.
zh: 夏日的阳光刺眼地照在我们身上。

en: I'm already accustomed to the heat of summer.
zh: 我已经习惯了夏天的炎热。

en: The flowers faded in the heat of the summer days.
zh: 鲜花在夏日的热浪中凋谢了。

en: The summer heat is rolling in.
zh: 夏天的热浪滚滚而来。

en: The store changed hands at the end of last summer.
zh: 这家商店在去年夏天末易主了。

en: The mountains are a lush green in summer.
zh: 夏天，山峦郁郁葱葱。

en: Some people like summer, and others like winter.
zh: 有些人喜欢夏天，有些人喜欢冬天。

en: They lent their house for the summer.
zh: 他们把房子借给我们过夏天。

en: We live in the country during the summer.
zh: 夏天我们住在乡下。

en: She took a job in a store for the summer.
zh: 她找了一份商店的工作，为了过夏天。

en: Keep away from the fire.
zh: 远离火源。

en: Stay away from the fire.
zh: 离火远点。

en: Be on your guard against fire.
zh: 小心防火。

en: We sat over a fire.
zh: 我们围坐在火堆旁。

en: Oxygen is needed for combustion.
zh: 燃烧需要氧气。

en: Warm yourself while the fire burns.
zh: 趁火烧着，暖和暖和。

en: No one can deny the fact that fire burns.
zh: 火会燃烧，这是谁也无法否认的事实。

en: The fire has gone out and this room is cold.
zh: 火灭了，这个房间很冷。

en: Please keep the fire from going out.
zh: 请让火一直烧着，别让它灭了。

en: The fire is out.
zh: 火灭了。

en: The fire is going out; will you add some wood?
zh: 火快灭了，你加点木头好吗？

en: As he had no way of making fire, he ate the fish raw.
zh: 因为他没法生火，所以他生吃了鱼。

en: The fire spread and licked the neighboring house.
zh: 火势蔓延，吞噬了邻近的房子。

en: The fire is burning furiously.
zh: 火烧得很旺。

en: Immediately after it caught fire, the chemical factory blew up.
zh: 化工厂刚着火就爆炸了。

en: There is no rose without a thorn.
zh: 没有不带刺的玫瑰。

en: The best swimmers are oftenest drowned.
zh: 善泳者溺水。

en: The rivers were flooded by the heavy rain.
zh: 大雨导致河流泛滥。

en: The basin of a river usually has rich farmland.
zh: 河流流域通常有肥沃的农田。

en: The mere idea of swimming across the river made me tremble.
zh: 仅仅是想到要游过这条河，我就感到害怕。

en: In Kabuki not only talent but also heredity counts.
zh: 在歌舞伎中，不仅天赋重要，遗传也很重要。

en: Kabuki is an old Japanese art.
zh: 歌舞伎是一种古老的日本艺术。

en: Do you know kabuki?
zh: 你知道歌舞伎吗？

en: A bad cold caused the singer to lose his voice.
zh: 严重的感冒导致这位歌手失声。

en: Everyone called out to the singer for an encore.
zh: 大家都向歌手喊着要求返场。

en: It is interesting to make friends with a foreigner.
zh: 和外国人交朋友很有趣。

en: It is difficult for foreigners to master Japanese.
zh: 外国人很难掌握日语。

en: It is difficult for a foreigner to study Japanese.
zh: 外国人很难学日语。

en: It is difficult for foreigners to get used to Japanese meals.
zh: 外国人很难习惯日本料理。

en: Foreign investors backed off because of regional political unrest.
zh: 由于地区政治动荡，外国投资者退出了。

en: Speaking foreign languages is not easy.
zh: 说外语不容易。

en: You'll find it your advantage to know a foreign language.
zh: 你会发现懂一门外语对你有利。

en: It is almost impossible to learn a foreign language in a short time.
zh: 在短时间内学会一门外语几乎是不可能的。

en: The best way to learn a foreign language is to go to the country where it is spoken.
zh: 学习外语最好的方法是去说这种语言的国家。

en: To speak a foreign language well takes time.
zh: 要说好一门外语需要时间。

en: The best way to master a foreign language is to go to the country where it is spoken.
zh: 掌握外语最好的方法是去说这种语言的国家。

en: It is not easy to learn a foreign language.
zh: 学习外语不容易。

en: It takes a great deal of practice to master a foreign language.
zh: 要掌握一门外语需要大量的练习。

en: It is by no means easy to master a foreign language.
zh: 要掌握一门外语绝非易事。

en: You must have a lot of patience to learn foreign languages.
zh: 学习外语你必须要有很大的耐心。

en: Few people can speak a foreign language perfectly.
zh: 很少有人能说一口完美的外语。

en: Learning a foreign language is difficult.
zh: 学习外语是困难的。

en: What is the best way to learn a foreign language?
zh: 学习外语最好的方法是什么？

en: It is often said that the best way to learn a foreign language is to go to the country where it is spoken.
zh: 人们常说，学习外语最好的方法是去说这种语言的国家。

en: It's difficult to learn a foreign language.
zh: 学习外语很难。

en: We should make good use of dictionaries when studying a foreign language.
zh: 我们在学习外语时应该好好利用词典。

en: Learning a foreign language is fun.
zh: 学习外语很有趣。

en: It takes years to master a foreign language.
zh: 掌握一门外语需要数年时间。

en: If I want to master a foreign language, I must study as much as possible.
zh: 如果我想掌握一门外语，我必须尽可能多地学习。

en: You can't master a foreign language in a short time; you have to study it step by step.
zh: 你不可能在短时间内掌握一门外语；你必须循序渐进地学习。

en: We must go forward getting the better of all obstacles.
zh: 我们必须克服一切障碍，勇往直前。

en: We should keep every school open and every teacher in his job.
zh: 我们应该保持所有学校开放，并保证每位老师都有工作。

en: We tried to eliminate all danger beforehand.
zh: 我们试图事先消除所有危险。

en: We were nearly frozen to death.
zh: 我们差点被冻死了。

en: Are we making a nonstop flight to the U.S.?
zh: 我们是直飞美国吗？

en: We ran down the hill.
zh: 我们跑下了山。

en: We should deny our children things too sweet.
zh: 我们应该拒绝给孩子们太甜的东西。

en: We are in a fierce competition with that company.
zh: 我们正与那家公司进行激烈的竞争。

en: We made the best of that bad situation.
zh: 我们充分利用了那糟糕的局面。

en: We cannot meet your needs.
zh: 我们无法满足您的需求。

en: We are looking to you for help.
zh: 我们正在向您寻求帮助。

en: How lucky we are to have had the opportunity to work with you!
zh: 我们真幸运，有机会和您一起工作！

en: We expect you to carry out what you have once promised.
zh: 我们希望您履行您曾经承诺过的事情。

en: We were running to and fro.
zh: 我们来回奔跑。

en: We looked for it high and low.
zh: 我们到处寻找它。

en: We will fight to the last.
zh: 我们将战斗到最后一刻。

en: We have made up our minds to fight it out.
zh: 我们已经下定决心要战斗到底。

en: We have breakfast at seven.
zh: 我们七点吃早餐。

en: We got to the station at six.
zh: 我们六点到达车站。

en: We have enjoyed peace for more than forty years.
zh: 我们已经享受了四十多年的和平。

en: We have enjoyed peace for more than 40 years.
zh: 我们已经享受了40多年的和平。

en: We arrived at an agreement after two hours' discussion.
zh: 经过两个小时的讨论，我们达成了一致。

en: We retire at eleven o'clock.
zh: 我们十一点睡觉。

en: We should look after our parents.
zh: 我们应该照顾我们的父母。

en: Can we create something out of nothing?
zh: 我们能从无到有创造出什么吗？

en: I cannot thank you too much.
zh: 我太感谢你了。

en: I beg your pardon?
zh: 你说什么？

en: Not knowing what to say, she just smiled.
zh: 不知道该说什么，她只是笑了笑。

en: I was wrong all the same.
zh: 无论如何，我还是错了。

en: After all, their form of transport produces no pollution at all.
zh: 毕竟，他们的交通工具根本不产生污染。

en: I was at a loss what to say.
zh: 我一时不知说什么好。

en: What a waste of water!
zh: 多浪费水啊！

en: What a waste of energy!
zh: 多浪费能源啊！

en: How slow you are!
zh: 你真慢！

en: So quick!
zh: 真快！

en: What made her do so?
zh: 是什么让她这么做的？

en: You have a lot of nerve!
zh: 你真大胆！

en: Hmmm, how shall I say this?
zh: 嗯...我该怎么说呢？

en: What led you to believe it?
zh: 是什么让你相信的？

en: What a cute little girl!
zh: 多么可爱的小女孩啊！

en: Why me?
zh: 为什么是我？

en: How naughty you are! Stop bothering me!
zh: 你真淘气！别烦我了！

en: Ask me anything!
zh: 随便问我什么！

en: What a good idea!
zh: 真是个好主意！

en: It's to your advantage to learn everything you can.
zh: 尽可能多地学习对你有利。

en: You cannot have your own way in everything.
zh: 你不能事事都随心所欲。

en: We cannot have our own way in everything.
zh: 我们不能事事都随心所欲。

en: You may take anything you like.
zh: 你喜欢什么就拿什么。

en: Call on us in case of any difficulties.
zh: 如果有什么困难，请来找我们。

en: Help yourself to anything you like.
zh: 随便吃点什么吧。

en: Never too much of anything.
zh: 任何东西都不嫌多。

en: Don't look back on your past.
zh: 不要回顾你的过去。

en: Too much water drowned the miller.
zh: 水多了淹死磨坊主。

en: Money circulates through the banking system.
zh: 资金在银行系统内流通。

en: It is without justification that money has been called one of the greatest inventions of man.
zh: 把钱称为人类最伟大的发明之一是没有道理的。

en: After some freight cars were derailed, services were suspended on the Chuo Line.
zh: 一些货车脱轨后，中央线的服务暂停了。

en: The section chief made me work like a slave.
zh: 科长让我像奴隶一样工作。

en: I heard the manager's wife is on vacation. And, well, when the cat's away, the mice play. Now he's out partying every night.
zh: 我听说经理的妻子在度假。 哎，山中无老虎，猴子称大王。 现在他每天晚上都出去聚会。

en: As soon as our manager got off our backs, everything started to go off without a hitch.
zh: 我们的经理一放松，一切都开始顺利进行。

en: The scores are low because the task is cognitively demanding.
zh: 分数很低，因为这项任务在认知上要求很高。

en: Opinions are divided on the issue of taxes.
zh: 对于税收问题，意见不一。

en: Do you have anything to declare?
zh: 你有什么要申报的吗？

en: It is often said that sweets are bad for your teeth.
zh: 人们常说甜食对牙齿不好。

en: You cannot have your cake and eat it, too.
zh: 鱼与熊掌不可兼得。

en: Could I check my bags?
zh: 我可以寄存我的行李吗？

en: I hope this makes it through baggage inspection.
zh: 我希望这能通过行李检查。

en: Would you keep this baggage, please?
zh: 请您保管这个行李好吗？

en: Make room for the baggage.
zh: 给行李腾出地方。

en: Would you carry my luggage upstairs?
zh: 你能帮我把行李搬到楼上吗？

en: May I leave my belongings on the bus?
zh: 我可以把我的东西留在公共汽车上吗？

en: I'd like to put my belongings away.
zh: 我想把我的东西放好。

en: You don't have to carry your baggage.
zh: 你不必携带你的行李。

en: Could you carry my bags for me?
zh: 你能帮我拿一下行李吗？

en: Please put your baggage on this scale.
zh: 请把你的行李放在这个秤上。

en: Let me help you with your baggage.
zh: 我来帮你拿行李吧。

en: Life begins when you pay taxes.
zh: 人生始于你开始缴税的时候。

en: What you don't have is better than what you do have.
zh: 你没有的东西比你拥有的更好。

en: It is never too late to learn.
zh: 活到老，学到老。

en: It's just five in the morning, but nevertheless it is light out.
zh: 现在才早上五点，但天已经亮了。

en: He told me the story of his life.
zh: 他告诉了我他的人生故事。

en: What are you talking about?
zh: 你在说什么？

en: I want a piece of candy.
zh: 我想要一块糖。

en: I knew that today would be fun.
zh: 我就知道今天会很开心。

en: When are we eating? I'm hungry!
zh: 我们什么时候吃饭？我饿了！

en: I have class tomorrow.
zh: 我明天有课。

en: I can't believe it!
zh: 我真不敢相信！

en: "Thank you." "You're welcome."
zh: “谢谢。”“不客气。”

en: How do you pronounce "pronounce"?
zh: “Pronounce”这个词怎么发音？

en: Winter is my favorite season.
zh: 冬天是我最喜欢的季节。

en: It's difficult to have great ideas.
zh: 拥有伟大的想法很难。

en: I learned a lot from you.
zh: 我从你身上学到了很多。

en: We walked a lot.
zh: 我们走了很多路。

en: I spent twelve hours on the train.
zh: 我在火车上待了十二个小时。

en: Hold on, someone is knocking at my door.
zh: 等等，有人在敲我的门。

en: He's sleeping like a baby.
zh: 他睡得像个婴儿一样。

en: There's a secret path on the left.
zh: 左边有一条秘密小路。

en: She's asking for the impossible.
zh: 她在要求不可能的事情。

en: He disappeared without a trace.
zh: 他消失得无影无踪。

en: I can place the palms of my hands on the floor without bending my knees.
zh: 我可以在不弯曲膝盖的情况下将手掌放在地板上。

en: There cannot be progress without communication.
zh: 没有沟通就不会有进步。

en: I agree with you to a degree.
zh: 我部分同意你的看法。

en: You can not appreciate the poem until you have read it many times.
zh: 你必须多读几遍才能体会这首诗的妙处。

en: The treaty has been concluded after many twists and turns.
zh: 这项条约历经曲折终于缔结了。

en: After having fought many hard battles, we were able to bring home the bacon and set up a new government.
zh: 经过多次艰苦的战斗，我们终于成功了，并建立了一个新政府。

en: Some people kept interrupting the speakers, and finally broke up the meeting.
zh: 有些人不停地打断发言者，最终导致会议解散。

en: I'll give you as many as you like.
zh: 你想要多少，我就给你多少。

en: Geometry, about which I know nothing, seems like a very dull subject.
zh: 几何，我对此一无所知，似乎是一个非常枯燥的科目。

en: Several newspapers published the story.
zh: 几家报纸刊登了这则新闻。

en: You should not give up your hope.
zh: 你不应该放弃希望。

en: You must not give up hope.
zh: 你绝不能放弃希望。

en: Having realized his hope, he returned home.
zh: 在实现了他的希望之后，他回到了家。

en: Don't give up hope.
zh: 不要放弃希望。

en: Thoughts of hope, dreams I'll never find.
zh: 希望的思绪，我永远无法实现的梦想。

en: Hope is the last thing that man has to flee unto.
zh: 希望是人类最后可以逃向的东西。

en: I didn't give up for lack of hope.
zh: 我没有因为缺乏希望而放弃。

en: As long as you have hope, a chance remains.
zh: 只要你还有希望，就还有机会。

en: The importation of rare wild animals to this country is strictly prohibited.
zh: 严格禁止向该国进口稀有野生动物。

en: No one can turn the clock back.
zh: 没有人能够让时光倒流。

en: When you take shelter, make sure you go under a big tree.
zh: 当你躲雨的时候，确保你躲在一棵大树下。

en: I was too glad not to jump up.
zh: 我太高兴了，忍不住跳了起来。

en: What with joy and shame, she blushed to the ears.
zh: 她又是高兴又是害羞，脸都红到耳根了。

en: To my joy, my daughter passed the examination.
zh: 令我高兴的是，我的女儿通过了考试。

en: To her joy, she passed the entrance examination.
zh: 令她高兴的是，她通过了入学考试。

en: I know you're happy about it. Why don't you just show it?
zh: 我知道你对此感到高兴。你为什么不表现出来呢？

en: Strange to say, the figure went out of sight suddenly.
zh: 说来奇怪，那个人影突然消失了。

en: I was exhausted by a full day's teaching.
zh: 一整天的教学让我筋疲力尽。

en: I am glad that the matter was settled amicably.
zh: 我很高兴这件事得到了友好的解决。

en: Is there an information counter?
zh: 请问有咨询台吗？

en: Korean food is generally very spicy.
zh: 韩国料理通常很辣。

en: Korean food is noted for its spicy flavor.
zh: 韩国料理以其辛辣的味道而闻名。

en: Korea is now up and coming.
zh: 韩国现在正在崛起。

en: What languages do they speak in Korea?
zh: 他们在韩国说什么语言？

en: A customs declaration is required.
zh: 需要海关申报。

en: Proponents of increased import duties are at odds with each other.
zh: 提高进口关税的支持者们意见不一致。

en: I would like to stress that it is more convenient to control tariffs as a bloc rather than country by country.
zh: 我想强调的是，作为一个整体来控制关税比一个国家一个国家地控制更方便。

en: We hope to lower the tariff.
zh: 我们希望降低关税。

en: The countries concerned settled the dispute by peaceful means.
zh: 有关国家通过和平手段解决了争端。

en: They found out truth while examining a pile of relevant documents.
zh: 他们在检查一堆相关文件时发现了真相。

en: Give me any books you have on the subject.
zh: 把你有关于这个主题的书都给我。

en: Such an accurate, lightning-quick reply. What can I say?
zh: 如此准确，如此迅速的回复。我还能说什么呢？

en: Social unrest may come about as a result of the endless rising of prices.
zh: 由于物价的不断上涨，可能会出现社会动荡。

en: Don't eat between meals.
zh: 不要在两餐之间吃东西。

en: Eating between meals is bad for the figure.
zh: 两餐之间吃东西对身材不好。

en: Eating between meals is a bad habit.
zh: 两餐之间吃东西是个坏习惯。

en: It is not good to eat between meals.
zh: 两餐之间吃东西不好。

en: It's a small noisy apartment, but it's where I live and I call it home.
zh: 这是一个又小又吵的公寓，但这是我住的地方，我称之为家。

en: We found the failure of the experiment at the last moment.
zh: 我们在最后一刻发现了实验的失败。

en: It's as deep as it is wide.
zh: 它既深又宽。

en: The geyser sends up a column of hot water every two hours.
zh: 间歇泉每两小时喷出一柱热水。

en: Business recovery, which looks just around the corner, will be rapid and strong.
zh: 看起来近在咫尺的商业复苏将会迅速而强劲。

en: Look out for rock slides.
zh: 小心落石。

en: The fall from the ledge shattered his leg.
zh: 从岩架上掉下来摔断了他的腿。

en: Rocks and minerals are useful for us in many ways.
zh: 岩石和矿物在很多方面对我们都有用。

en: The rock rolled down the hillside.
zh: 石头滚下了山坡。

en: Sitting on the rock, she sang a sweet song as she combed her hair.
zh: 她坐在石头上，一边梳头一边唱着甜美的歌。

en: A small stream ran down among the rocks.
zh: 一条小溪在岩石间流淌。

en: The rocks are weathered into fantastic forms.
zh: 岩石风化成了奇特的形状。

en: A rock stuck out from the bank into the river.
zh: 一块岩石从岸边伸入河中。

en: I don't exist to you.
zh: 对你来说，我不存在。

en: You have to adjust your glasses to your eyes.
zh: 你必须调整眼镜以适应你的眼睛。

en: I've lost my glasses.
zh: 我把眼镜弄丢了。

en: Wearing glasses should correct your vision.
zh: 戴眼镜应该可以矫正视力。

en: Without his glasses, he is as blind as a bat.
zh: 没有眼镜，他就跟瞎子一样。

en: Since the bridge looks like a pair of glasses, they call it Meganebashi.
zh: 因为这座桥看起来像一副眼镜，所以他们称它为眼镜桥。

en: Survey the landscape below.
zh: 俯瞰下方的景色。

en: The eye may see for the hand, but not for the mind.
zh: 眼睛可以为手看，但不能为心灵看。

en: A person with weak eyes can't see far.
zh: 眼睛不好的人看不远。

en: The cancer has spread to her stomach.
zh: 癌细胞已经扩散到她的胃部。

en: Cancer can be cured if discovered in time.
zh: 如果及时发现，癌症是可以治愈的。

en: We have yet to discover an effective remedy for cancer.
zh: 我们尚未发现治疗癌症的有效方法。

en: Silence grows like cancer.
zh: 沉默像癌症一样蔓延。

en: Can you hear the noise of the waves on the beach?
zh: 你能听到海滩上波浪的声音吗？

en: I can see some boats far away from the shore.
zh: 我能看到一些远离海岸的船只。

en: I'm getting sick and tired of Ms Maruta and her noisy friends.
zh: 我越来越厌烦丸田女士和她那些吵闹的朋友们。

en: The logs flamed brightly.
zh: 木头燃烧得很旺。

en: There should be something for us to talk about.
zh: 我们之间应该有些什么可以聊聊。

en: What have you got to say for yourself?
zh: 你有什么要为自己辩解的吗？

en: What's new?
zh: 有什么新鲜事吗？

en: She must have sensed something odd.
zh: 她一定是感觉到了什么不对劲。

en: There must be another way.
zh: 一定有别的办法。

en: I smell something rotten.
zh: 我闻到什么东西腐烂的味道。

en: Let me know if you are in need of anything.
zh: 如果你需要什么，请告诉我。

en: Don't hesitate to tell me if you need anything.
zh: 如果你需要什么，请随时告诉我。

en: Please bring me some medicine for airsickness.
zh: 请给我一些晕车药。

en: What tempted him to propose to her?
zh: 什么诱惑他向她求婚？

en: What made her do such a thing?
zh: 什么让她做出这样的事？

en: What tempted him to come home?
zh: 什么诱惑他回家？

en: If you have some troubles, I recommend you confer with him.
zh: 如果你有什么麻烦，我建议你和他商量一下。

en: Please give me something hot to drink.
zh: 请给我一些热的喝的。

en: May I have something hot to drink?
zh: 我可以来点热的喝的吗？

en: Do you have anything hot?
zh: 你们有什么热的吗？

en: Time will pass quite quickly when you read something.
zh: 当你阅读的时候，时间会过得很快。

en: Lend me some books to read.
zh: 借我一些书看看。

en: I want something to read.
zh: 我想要一些东西看。

en: Are you doing anything special?
zh: 你有什么特别的安排吗？

en: Do you have anything to say in particular?
zh: 你有什么特别要说的吗？

en: Do you have anything in mind?
zh: 你有什么想法吗？

en: Do you have anything to relieve a headache?
zh: 你有什么可以缓解头痛的药吗？

en: We must devise some means of escape.
zh: 我们必须想出一些逃脱的方法。

en: Whatever happens, I'll stick to my principles to the bitter end.
zh: 无论发生什么，我都会坚持我的原则到底。

en: Close things look blurred.
zh: 近处的东西看起来很模糊。

en: How about playing catch in the vacant lot near by?
zh: 要不要在附近的空地上玩捉迷藏？

en: We could hear the donnnng ... donnnng of the church bells nearby.
zh: 我们可以听到附近教堂的咚…咚…钟声。

en: There is a hospital nearby.
zh: 附近有一家医院。

en: There is a shopping area nearby.
zh: 附近有一个购物区。

en: Sit near at hand.
zh: 坐在手边。

en: There is a flower shop near by.
zh: 附近有一家花店。

en: Are there any movie theaters near here?
zh: 这附近有电影院吗？

en: Is there a McDonald's near here?
zh: 这附近有麦当劳吗？

en: There is a bus stop near by.
zh: 附近有一个公交车站。

en: Are there any towns with festivals near here?
zh: 这附近有什么有节日的城镇吗？

en: There's a nice Thai restaurant near here.
zh: 这附近有一家不错的泰国餐厅。

en: A fire broke out nearby.
zh: 附近发生了火灾。

en: Baskets are being made nearby.
zh: 附近有人在编篮子。

en: I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.
zh: 期待尽快收到你的来信。

en: I'm looking forward to seeing you before long.
zh: 期待不久后见到你。

en: I would like to repay your kindness in the near future.
zh: 我想在不久的将来报答你的恩情。

en: Do you think you'll be getting more in soon?
zh: 你觉得你们很快会进更多货吗？

en: In the near future, we may have a big earthquake in Japan.
zh: 在不久的将来，日本可能会发生大地震。

en: We may meet again in the near future.
zh: 我们可能会在不久的将来再次见面。

en: There is no telling what will happen in the near future.
zh: 谁也说不准在不久的将来会发生什么。

en: In the near future, space travel will no longer be just a dream.
zh: 在不久的将来，太空旅行将不再只是一个梦想。

en: There will be an energy crisis in the near future.
zh: 在不久的将来，将会出现能源危机。

en: Will there be an earthquake in the near future?
zh: 在不久的将来会发生地震吗？

en: Can we get to the moon in the near future?
zh: 在不久的将来我们能登上月球吗？
